peril.helpers

Class AIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.AIHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AIController

    public final class AIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements AIController
    The controller for all AI to Game interactions.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.10
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli
